On Sat, 21 Aug 2004 16:14:49 +0100, Colin Green <cgreen@...> wrote:
> If I were to change (2) so that I focus in on the fittest species (as
> does original NEAT) then the fitness would (should) not ever drop. 

I think the easiest way to double-check what's going on is to do a run
with traditional NEAT, and disable the culling feature altogether. 
ANJI doesn't implement culling, and it works reasonably well.

How about giving that a try?  And if you see the fitness degenerating
to 10 in regular NEAT runs, you know something else is wrong.

Derek
